name: Sir Long Legs 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

After some time at the local pub, the chosen one stumbles upon the legendary boots and finds himself suddenly equipped with towering long legs. He must now reclaim his rightful throne. However, the path ahead will prove to be troublesome, each step towards his goal being harder than the previous one.

Platform: PC, Nintendo Switch
Engine: Unreal Engine 4 
Number of player: 1
Genre : Adventure

Producer : Louise DELEENS, Adil MOHAMED
Game Art : Laetitia CHERUAU, Aurélie BARNADAT, Marie M'HAMMED OUBELLA, Vassili DRESCHMANN
Game Design : Eloïse VREL, Jean HARANG, Marine NICAULT
Game Design & Programming : Andy BASTEL, Lux DIAZ
Game Programming : Thomas COLIN
Music & Sound Design : Hugo ANGLADE, Paul CUANBINH-MICHELON
